data.author: Reuters
data.title: Tennis-Lestienne a winner as ATP tennis returns to New Zealand
data.description: French journeyman Constant Lestienne wrote a small footnote in the history of men’s tennis on Monday when he won the first ATP Tour match in New Zealand for three years in the opening round of the Auckland Open. Now an Australian Open warm-up, the Auckland Open had been played every year since 1956 until New […]

data.title: New Balance CoCo CG1 Tennis Shoe Review | Tennis Express
data.description: There is one WTA tour player with a signature shoe, and it is Coco Gauff. The young star plays a brilliant backcourt style of tennis with incredible defense, but has also proven to be a threat on the doubles court. The New Balance shoe features a basketball style mid-top design, which locks the heel in place nicely. The CG1 is designed to hold up to the needs of aggressive movers, and athletes that leave it all out there on the court.Shop the New Balance Coco CG1 at Tennis Express: https://www.tennisexpress.com/new-balance-tennis-shoes

data.title: Kenya Junior Tennis team win bronze at Africa Tennis championships
data.description: Kenya won bronze at the concluded International Tennis Federation (ITF)/Confederation of African Tennis (CAT) at the African Junior competition in Maputo, Mozambique. The team made up of Seline Ahoya, Nancy Kawira and Liya Gikunda defeated Mozambique 3-0 for bronze. They started with a 3-0 loss to Tunisia, went ahead to beat Ghana 2-1 and Namibia […]

data.title: Tennis-Rubin comes up short in tennis, ready to walk tall in pickleball
data.description: Noah Rubin has been unable to hit the heights expected of him since winning junior Wimbledon in 2014 and the American says he has decided to swap his racket for a paddle to explore a career in the fast-growing sport of pickleball. data.title: Tennis: Diese Damen sind unschlagbar
data.description: Fünf Spiele, fünf Siege – die Tennis-Damen 30 der Spielgemeinschaft Beckingen/Nalbach waren in diesem Jahr einfach unschlagbar und haben souverän die Meisterschaft in der Saarlandliga errungen. In der kommenden Saison wird die Mannschaft nun in der Oberliga aufschlagen.
